project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A comprehensive portal to improve customer onboarding, reduce churn, and increase self-service capabilities.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Checklists accurately reflect customer's subscription tier

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily find and access relevant documentation

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Customers can clearly see their product usage and adoption trends

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily contact their CSM with relevant information

system_components: Microservices (Customer Data, Onboarding, Metrics, Knowledge Base)
technical_architecture.data_flow: Customer data is retrieved from the CRM and Subscription Management System, used to personalize the onboarding experience, and stored in the Customer Data microservice. Usage metrics are collected, processed, and displayed in the Metrics microservice. Knowledge base content is fetched from the external API and integrated into the web application.
security_considerations: Implement secure API authentication and authorization

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including self-service onboarding, knowledge base integration, and adoption metrics.
Enhance the COSP with additional features to improve customer success and support.

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in integrating with existing systems (CRM, Knowledge Base, Usage Tracking)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with system owners early, establish clear integration requirements and testing protocols

risk_analysis.description: Unexpected complexity in developing personalized onboarding checklists
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate additional time and resources for this feature, involve subject matter experts in the design phase

risk_analysis.description: Performance and scalability issues due to high user concurrency
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement a scalable, cloud-based architecture, conduct load testing, and provision for future growth
